Situation:
  1. Project just started. All teams are working with current project status.
  2. Specification team has finished specification for release 1 and starts working on specification for release 2 while development and QA team are still working on release 1



 Typical Needs:

 2a. Development and QA team
  • should not be affected by changes in specification, which are only relevant for the next release
  • link test cases to requirements
2b. Specification team
  • modify specification for next release
  • do not loose links between test cases and requirements based on release 1
  • remove link between test case and requirement if requirement needs to be changed for next release
How Polarion helps:

  • create branched documents frozen to specific revision or baseline to avoid unwanted changes
  • use overwrite, remove or add functionality to modify branched documents frozen to a specific revision or baseline
  • use spaces to group project artefacte like specifications for a specific release
How to support teams working parallel on different releases
